output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - Contains CMF 11240014, which indicates this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: - Directly mentions "George Simion" who is a presidential candidate - Position #2 on the presidential ballot
3. Addresses wide population: - Paid advertisement with significant reach (35,000-39,999 impressions) - Targets a large estimated audience (100,001-500,000) - Uses public calls to action
4. Electoral objective: - Direct call to vote: "Pe 24 noiembrie, votează George Simion Președinte!" - Clear campaign slogan: "Familie. Credință. Viitor." - Uses campaign hashtags: #GeorgeSimion #Romania2024
5. Journalism: - This is not journalistic content - Clear campaign material with direct voting instructions
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but an organized campaign message - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number, slogans)
This is a clear violation of Article 55 t) as it: - Continues electoral propaganda after the legal conclusion period - Directly instructs people how to vote on election day - Is a paid advertisement running during the prohibited period

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number) - Direct call to vote for a specific candidate - Paid distribution with significant reach - Clear campaign messaging and slogans - Explicitly mentions the election date and voting instructions
conclusion.message-for-police: Moza Costel -Consilier Local Oradea, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propagandă electorală plătit (ID Facebook: 492771710468418) care îndeamnă în mod direct la votarea candidatului George Simion în ziua alegerilor ("Pe 24 noiembrie, votează George Simion Președinte!"). Materialul prezintă element de identificare specific campaniei electorale (CMF 11240014), are un impact semnificativ (35,000-39,999 impresii) și continuă propaganda electorală după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel perioada de restricție prevăzută de lege. Mesajul este distribuit ca reclamă plătită pe Facebook, cu un buget între 300-399 RON.
